t: Tropicana Redesign – Packaging Of The World
s: As the Original Orange Juice brand in a competitive category where consumers tend to view almost all juice as the same, Tropicana recognised a golden opportunity to deepen consumer affection and chart a path towards a vibrant future with a restaging of their brand.
